abstract.t: In many use cases, particularly in workload environments, a single access token or similar security artifact is not sufficient for conveying the type of security and provenance information necessary. This draft describes a data model and format for an additive data container to address these concerns. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/bspk/draft-richer-wimse-token-container.
